## figure output

```{r}
metabolite_distribution_plot <- ggplot2::ggplot(lipidomics, aes(x = value)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  facet_wrap(vars(metabolite), scales = "free")
metabolite_distribution_plot
```

```{r function }
plot_distributions <- function(data) {
  ggplot2::ggplot(data, aes(x = value)) +
    geom_histogram() +
    facet_wrap(vars(metabolite), scales = "free")
}
plot_distributions(lipidomics)
```
